page.title: 07THE BARRACKS. THE RED CROSS.
page.content: At the{Barracks}soldiers are trained for 20 weeks.The training and lance corporals & riflemen are issued with boots, trousers, shirt, beret, rifle & machine gun, backpack, food & spare clothing. They live in the barracks, eat in canteen, do own ironing & boot polishing.There are 5 lady soldiers. The soldiers do not have much contact with the people of Winchester. Nearby, officers live with their families. { {Red Cross }headquarters are in Weeke because the house was a gift. Many of the workers are volunteers. They have nursing, first aid, youth groups, welfare,camps,fundays,carol concerts & courses. They have lots of clubs for people with mental illness and for all ages. There is a store of things that the elderly may need which can be hired. There is a fleet of mini-buses.
